original_text:
Just Jewels deluxe
Caratteristiche generali
Software: Novomatic
Rulli: 5
Linee di vincita: 10
Puntata minima: 0.40 €
Puntata massima: 100 €
Payout: 95,42%

Just Jewels Deluxe e Just Jewels: differenze
Sebbene si tratti in entrambi i casi di slot machine con un sistema di gioco molto semplice e intuitivo, senza Bonus Game e con un’unica funzionalità extra (la funzione Gamble), tra Just Jewels Deluxe e la precedente versione ci sono alcune sostanziali differenze.
Innanzitutto, ciò che balza immediatamente agli occhi è la presenza di una linea di pagamento in più, il che aumenta le possibilità di ottenere delle combinazioni vincenti.
I simboli son sempre gli stessi, anche qui manca il simbolo Wild ma è presente lo Scatter.
La differenza più grossa tra le due slot la ritroviamo a livello di range di scommesse.
Mentre Just Jewels presentava un range di puntate molto limitato (si andava infatti da 0,01 € fino a soli 9 €), nella versione Deluxe abbiamo un margine molto più ampio, partendo da 0,40 centesimi per arrivare fino a un massimo di 100 €. In questo modo si supera il più grande limite della precedente versione, che era adatta a chi si affacciava per la prima volta al mondo delle slot machine, ma era poco entusiasmante invece per i giocatori che amano puntare delle somme consistenti.

Simboli e sistema di gioco
I simboli, come da tradizione in questa slot, sono tutti legati al tema della ricchezza. Accanto alle pietre preziose (ametiste, smeraldi, zaffiri e rubini) troviamo infatti il logo dell’euro, dei mazzetti di banconote, dei lingotti d’oro e delle corone tempestate di gemme.
I simboli che pagano di meno sono rappresentati dalle pietre preziose, mentre quello che ha più valore in assoluto è la corona.
Il logo dell’euro è lo Scatter di questo gioco, e paga la vincita a prescindere dalla posizione occupata sui rulli, a differenza di tutti gli altri simboli che devono essere rigorosamente allineanti da sinistra verso destra.
Quando lo Scatter compare sui rulli per almeno tre volte, si attivano in automatico dei giri gratuiti in cui le vincite sono moltiplicate.
Immancabile poi la funzione Gamble che permette di giocarsi l’intero montepremi e provare a raddoppiarlo. Se si accetta il rischio, compare sullo schermo una carta girata di cui deve essere indovinato il colore, rosso o nero. Se il giocatore fa la scelta giusta, vedrà raddoppiata la sua vincita iniziale, in caso contrario però si perde l’intero importo.

Slot machine simili
Il tema della ricchezza, come è ovvio, è ampiamente sviluppato nell’ambito delle slot machine e diverse software house lo propongono nel loro catalogo.
Se il vostro sogno è sentirvi il Paperon De Paperoni delle slot, bè, King of Cash potrebbe fare proprio al caso vostro, per un’esperienza di gioco immersi nel lusso sfrenato delle antiche nobiltà, con forzieri, sacchi pieni di monete e carrozze reali!
GameArt propone invece Slot of Money, in cui i simboli sono anche qui legati al mondo della ricchezza estrema e degli oggetti che la rappresentano, tra i quali auto di lusso, champagne, orologi rigorosamente d’oro e magnifici yacht!

raw_translation.response:
Just Jewels deluxe

General Features
Software: Novomatic
Reels: 5
Paylines: 10
Minimum bet: €0.40
Maximum bet: €100
Payout: 95.42%

Just Jewels Deluxe vs Just Jewels: Differences
Although both are slot machines with a very simple and intuitive gameplay system, without Bonus Game and with only one extra feature (the Gamble function), there are some substantial differences between Just Jewels Deluxe and the previous version.
Firstly, what immediately catches the eye is the presence of an extra payline, which increases the chances of getting winning combinations.
The symbols are always the same, with no Wild symbol but a Scatter symbol present.
The biggest difference between the two slots is found in the range of bets.
While Just Jewels had a very limited betting range (ranging from just €0.01 up to €9), in the Deluxe version we have a much wider range, starting from €0.40 and going up to a maximum of €100. This overcomes the biggest limit of the previous version, which was suitable for those who were new to the world of slot machines, but not very exciting for players who like to bet substantial sums.

Symbols and Gameplay System
The symbols, as tradition dictates in this slot, are all related to the theme of wealth. Alongside the precious stones (amethysts, emeralds, sapphires, and rubies), we find the euro logo, bundles of banknotes, gold bars, and gem-studded crowns.
The symbols that pay the least are represented by the precious stones, while the one with the highest value is the crown.
The euro logo is the Scatter symbol in this game, and pays out regardless of its position on the reels, unlike all the other symbols, which must be strictly aligned from left to right.
When the Scatter appears on the reels at least three times, free spins are automatically activated, during which winnings are multiplied.
The Gamble function is also an essential feature, allowing players to stake the entire prize pool and attempt to double it. If the player accepts the risk, a card is displayed on the screen, which must have its color guessed as either red or black. If the player makes the right choice, their initial win will be doubled, but if they get it wrong, they will lose the entire amount.

Similar Slot Machines
The theme of wealth, as expected, is widely developed in the realm of slot machines, with different software houses offering it in their catalogs.
If your dream is to feel like Scrooge McDuck in the world of slot machines, well, King of Cash might be just the thing for you, providing a gaming experience immersed in the unrestrained luxury of ancient nobility, with chests, sacks full of coins, and regal carriages!
GameArt, on the other hand, offers Slot of Money, where the symbols are also related to the world of extreme wealth and the objects that represent it, including luxury cars, champagne, strictly gold watches, and magnificent yachts!

Review: Just Jewels deluxe

General Features
Software: Novomatic
Reels: 5
Paylines: 10
Minimum bet: €0.40
Maximum bet: €100
Payout: 95.42%

Just Jewels Deluxe vs Just Jewels: Differences
Although both are slot machines with a very simple and intuitive gameplay system, without Bonus Game and with only one extra feature (the Gamble function), there are some substantial differences between Just Jewels Deluxe and the previous version.
Firstly, what immediately catches the eye is the presence of an extra payline, which increases the chances of getting winning combinations.
The symbols are always the same, with no Wild symbol but a Scatter symbol present.
The biggest difference between the two slots is found in the range of bets.
While Just Jewels had a very limited betting range (ranging from just €0.01 up to €9), in the Deluxe version we have a much wider range, starting from €0.40 and going up to a maximum of €100. This overcomes the biggest limit of the previous version, which was suitable for those who were new to the world of slot machines, but not very exciting for players who like to bet substantial sums.

Symbols and Gameplay System
The symbols, as tradition dictates in this slot, are all related to the theme of wealth. Alongside the precious stones (amethysts, emeralds, sapphires, and rubies), we find the euro logo, bundles of banknotes, gold bars, and gem-studded crowns.
The symbols that pay the least are represented by the precious stones, while the one with the highest value is the crown.
The euro logo is the Scatter symbol in this game, and pays out regardless of its position on the reels, unlike all the other symbols, which must be strictly aligned from left to right.
When the Scatter appears on the reels at least three times, free spins are automatically activated, during which winnings are multiplied.
The Gamble function is also an essential feature, allowing players to stake the entire prize pool and attempt to double it. If the player accepts the risk, a card is displayed on the screen, which must have its color guessed as either red or black. If the player makes the right choice, their initial win will be doubled, but if they get it wrong, they will lose the entire amount.

Similar Slot Machines
The theme of wealth, as expected, is widely developed in the realm of slot machines, with different software houses offering it in their catalogs.
If your dream is to feel like Scrooge McDuck in the world of slot machines, well, King of Cash might be just the thing for you, providing a gaming experience immersed in the unrestrained luxury of ancient nobility, with chests, sacks full of coins, and regal carriages!
GameArt, on the other hand, offers Slot of Money, where the symbols are also related to the world of extreme wealth and the objects that represent it, including luxury cars, champagne, strictly gold watches, and magnificent yachts!

With all these options, players are sure to feel like a kid in a candy store - or, dare we say, a king in a jewelry store?

Other similar games include King of Cash, which features a gaming experience immersed in the unrestrained luxury of ancient nobility, and Slot of Money by GameArt, where the symbols are related to the world of extreme wealth and the objects that represent it.

response.meta_title: Play Just Jewels Deluxe for Free - Game Review
response.meta_description: Read our review of Just Jewels Deluxe, a simple but exciting online slot game with a wide betting range. Play for free!

meta.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
meta.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Just Jewels deluxe".

Please provide the following:

- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we like". (4 bullet points)
- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we don't like". (2 bullet pints)
- SEO optimized meta title with a maximum length of 45 characters. Include the words "play" and "free". Capitalize according to AP rules.
- SEO optimized, neutral meta description, explaining the review with a maximum length of 20 words. Include the words "play" and "free".

Respond with a JSON using the keys "pros" (simple array), "cons" (simple array), "meta_title" and "meta_description". 

Review:
 
Gameplay mechanics

Just Jewels Deluxe is a slot machine with a simple and intuitive gameplay system, with no Bonus Game and only one extra feature - the Gamble function. One of the biggest differences from the previous version is the presence of an extra payline, which increases the player's chances of getting winning combinations. There is no Wild symbol, but a Scatter symbol is present. Free spins are triggered by landing three Scatters on the reels.

Betting options

The betting range in Just Jewels Deluxe is much wider than that of the previous version, starting from €0.40 and going up to a maximum of €100. This makes it a more exciting option for players who like to bet substantial sums.

Symbol design

All symbols in Just Jewels Deluxe are related to the theme of wealth. Alongside the precious stones, there are symbols such as the euro logo, bundles of banknotes, gold bars, and gem-studded crowns. The symbols that pay the least are the precious stones, while the one with the highest value is the crown. The euro logo acts as a Scatter symbol and pays out regardless of its position on the reels.

Similar games

The theme of wealth is popular in the slot machine world, and other software houses offer games with similar motifs. King of Cash by Microgaming provides a gaming experience immersed in the unrestrained luxury of ancient nobility, with chests, sacks full of coins, and regal carriages. GameArt's Slot of Money is another option, where the symbols emphasize objects of extreme wealth, including champagne, luxury cars, gold watches, and magnificent yachts.

Payout rate

The payout rate for Just Jewels Deluxe is 95.42%, which is within the industry standard for online slot machines. This means that players can expect to receive a fair return on their wagers over time.

Review: Just Jewels deluxe

General Features
Software: Novomatic
Reels: 5
Paylines: 10
Minimum bet: €0.40
Maximum bet: €100
Payout: 95.42%

Just Jewels Deluxe vs Just Jewels: Differences
Although both are slot machines with a very simple and intuitive gameplay system, without Bonus Game and with only one extra feature (the Gamble function), there are some substantial differences between Just Jewels Deluxe and the previous version.
Firstly, what immediately catches the eye is the presence of an extra payline, which increases the chances of getting winning combinations.
The symbols are always the same, with no Wild symbol but a Scatter symbol present.
The biggest difference between the two slots is found in the range of bets.
While Just Jewels had a very limited betting range (ranging from just €0.01 up to €9), in the Deluxe version we have a much wider range, starting from €0.40 and going up to a maximum of €100. This overcomes the biggest limit of the previous version, which was suitable for those who were new to the world of slot machines, but not very exciting for players who like to bet substantial sums.

Symbols and Gameplay System
The symbols, as tradition dictates in this slot, are all related to the theme of wealth. Alongside the precious stones (amethysts, emeralds, sapphires, and rubies), we find the euro logo, bundles of banknotes, gold bars, and gem-studded crowns.
The symbols that pay the least are represented by the precious stones, while the one with the highest value is the crown.
The euro logo is the Scatter symbol in this game, and pays out regardless of its position on the reels, unlike all the other symbols, which must be strictly aligned from left to right.
When the Scatter appears on the reels at least three times, free spins are automatically activated, during which winnings are multiplied.
The Gamble function is also an essential feature, allowing players to stake the entire prize pool and attempt to double it. If the player accepts the risk, a card is displayed on the screen, which must have its color guessed as either red or black. If the player makes the right choice, their initial win will be doubled, but if they get it wrong, they will lose the entire amount.

Similar Slot Machines
The theme of wealth, as expected, is widely developed in the realm of slot machines, with different software houses offering it in their catalogs.
If your dream is to feel like Scrooge McDuck in the world of slot machines, well, King of Cash might be just the thing for you, providing a gaming experience immersed in the unrestrained luxury of ancient nobility, with chests, sacks full of coins, and regal carriages!
GameArt, on the other hand, offers Slot of Money, where the symbols are also related to the world of extreme wealth and the objects that represent it, including luxury cars, champagne, strictly gold watches, and magnificent yachts!
